title: Conda Install: PackageNotFoundError
body_html:
Hi, I'm trying to install Pytorch on MacOS (High Sierra) with Conda 4.3.15, Python 3.5.

I ran:

conda create -n pytorch
source activate pytorch
conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch

However, I keep getting a blank PackageNotFoundErrror:

Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: 


PackageNotFoundError: Package not found: Conda could not find '

Has anyone seen this issue before? I'm pretty sure I'm following the instructions correctly, so I'm wondering where things are going wrong.

If I run conda create -n pytorch anaconda to include all Anaconda packages, and then run conda update --all, I still get the same issue, so I don't think it has anything to do with dependencies.

In case the info is helpful, running conda info returns:

platform : osx-64
          conda version : 4.3.15
       conda is private : False
      conda-env version : 4.3.15
    conda-build version : 3.0.19
         python version : 3.5.3.final.0
       requests version : 2.14.2
       root environment : /Users/lucashu/anaconda  (writable)
    default environment : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/envs/pytorch
       envs directories : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/envs
                          /Users/lucashu/.conda/envs
          package cache : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/pkgs
                          /Users/lucashu/.conda/pkgs
           channel URLs : http://conda.anaconda.org/gurobi/osx-64
                          http://conda.anaconda.org/gurobi/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/free/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/free/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/r/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/r/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/pro/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/pro/noarch
            config file : /Users/lucashu/.condarc
           offline mode : False
             user-agent : conda/4.3.15 requests/2.14.2 CPython/3.5.3 Darwin/17.6.0 OSX/10.13.5
                UID:GID : 501:20

Thanks in advance!

body:
Hi, I'm trying to install Pytorch on MacOS (High Sierra) with Conda 4.3.15, Python 3.5.

I ran:
```
conda create -n pytorch
source activate pytorch
conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch
```

However, I keep getting a blank `PackageNotFoundErrror`:
```
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: 


PackageNotFoundError: Package not found: Conda could not find '
```

Has anyone seen this issue before? I'm pretty sure I'm following the instructions correctly, so I'm wondering where things are going wrong. 

If I run `conda create -n pytorch anaconda` to include all Anaconda packages, and then run `conda update --all`, I still get the same issue, so I don't think it has anything to do with dependencies.

In case the info is helpful, running `conda info` returns:
```
platform : osx-64
          conda version : 4.3.15
       conda is private : False
      conda-env version : 4.3.15
    conda-build version : 3.0.19
         python version : 3.5.3.final.0
       requests version : 2.14.2
       root environment : /Users/lucashu/anaconda  (writable)
    default environment : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/envs/pytorch
       envs directories : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/envs
                          /Users/lucashu/.conda/envs
          package cache : /Users/lucashu/anaconda/pkgs
                          /Users/lucashu/.conda/pkgs
           channel URLs : http://conda.anaconda.org/gurobi/osx-64
                          http://conda.anaconda.org/gurobi/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/free/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/free/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/r/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/r/noarch
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/pro/osx-64
                          https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/pro/noarch
            config file : /Users/lucashu/.condarc
           offline mode : False
             user-agent : conda/4.3.15 requests/2.14.2 CPython/3.5.3 Darwin/17.6.0 OSX/10.13.5
                UID:GID : 501:20
```

Thanks in advance!
